module.name: HH Quick Provisioner
module.description: Enterprise Provisioning Tool v2.2.0. Features: Per-Device Provisioning Authentication, Local Network Detection, Visual Key Editor with Paging, Protected Asset Manager, File-based Handset Model Templates with Import/Download/Delete, Kid Mode PIN, Wallpaper Resizing, Schematic Previews, Contact Management, Dynamic Provisioning with Custom Overrides.
